panels.description: Moc instalacji fotowoltaicznej to moc okrelona dla tzw. warunk贸w STC (Standard Test Conditions). Moc instalacji PV podajemy w Watt-pikach [Wp lub kWp=1000Wp]. W warunkach polskich mo偶na przyj, i偶 moc instalacji wyra偶ona w kWp to moc maksymalna instalacji.
panels.title: Moc Teoretyczna Maksymalna

mappings.text: Power grid phase wire short-circuit to PE

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "Power=hourly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none) tz('UTC')
SELECT mean("value")  /1000 FROM "Power=monthly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value")  /1000 FROM "Power=monthly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value")  *80/100*0.59 FROM "Power=monthly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value")  *80/100*0.59 FROM "Power=monthly" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
